Innate Power: Reveal the top card of a deck. Put it into play or into the trash.
Incapacitated: One player may draw a card now
One player may play a card now
Select a Target. Reduce damage dealt to that Target by 1 until the start of your next turn.
Name: Omnitron-X

Rocket Punch.text: Power: Omnitron-X deals 1 Target 2 Projectile Damage. Omnitron-X may deal 1 Target 1 Projectile Damage.

Electro-Deployment Unit.text: At the start of your turn, either draw a card or play a card. If Omnitron-X is dealt 5 or more Damage in one turn, destroy this card.

Focused Plasma Cannon.text: At the start of your turn, Omnitron-X may deal 1 Target 2 Irreducible Fire Damage. If Omnitron-X is dealt 5 or more Damage in one turn, destroy this card.

Guassian Coil Blaster.text: At the start of your turn, Omnitron-X deals up to 3 Targets 1 Lightning Damage each. If Omnitron-X is dealt 5 or more Damage in one turn, destroy this card.

Innervation Ray.text: At the start of your turn, up to 3 Hero Targets regain 1 HP each. If Omnitron-X is dealt 5 or more Damage in one turn, destroy this card.

Disruptive Flechettes.text: Destroy up to 2 Ongoing cards. Omnitron-X deals each non-Hero Target 2 Projectile Damage.

Reset.text: Shuffle your trash into your deck. You may draw a card. You may play a card.

Self Sabotage.text: Destroy any number of Component cards. Omnitron-X deals 1 Target X Energy Damage, where X = the number of Component cards destroyed by this card times 2.

Singularity.text: Destroy any number of Equipment cards. Omnitron-X deals each non-Hero Target X Lightning Damage, where X = the number of Equipment cards destroyed by this card.

Technological Advancement.text: Search your deck for a Plating card or a Component card. Put it into play. Shuffle your deck. You may draw a card.

Bio-Engineering Beam.text: Power: Destroy an Environment card. Omnitron-X deals 1 non-Hero Target 2 Energy Damage.

Defensive Blast.text: Power: Discard a Plating card. If you do, Omnitron-X deals each non-Hero Target 1 Damage of each type currently reduced by a Plating card.

Reactive Plating Subroutine.text: Whenever Omnitron-X is dealt Damage of a type currently reduced by a Plating card, Omnitron-X deals 1 Target 2 Damage of that type.

Slip Through Time.text: At the end of your turn, you may play a card and you may use a Power. At the start of your turn, destroy this card.

Ablative Coating.text: Reduce Melee, Projectile, and Toxic Damage dealt to Omnitron-X by 2. When this card enters play, return all other Plating cards to your hand.

Elemental Exochassis.text: Reduce Cold, Fire, Lightning, and Energy Damage dealt to Omnitron-X by 2. When this card enters play, return all other Plating cards to your hand.

Temporal Shielding.text: Reduce Psychic, Infernal, Radiant, and Sonic Damage dealt to Omnitron-X by 2. When this card enters play, return all other Plating cards to your hand.
